titleInfo.title: Krallman v. State of Kansas et al
titleInfo.subTitle: PRISONER PAYMENT ORDER granting 2 Motion for Leave to Proceed in forma pauperis. Plaintiff Matthew D. Krallman is ordered to pay initial filing fee of $6.30 by 12/8/06. Clerk shall serve a copy of this order on appropriate officer at plaintiff's institution. Ordered by Magistrate Judge F. A. Gossett. COPIES MAILED to CJ-SHAWNEE Shawnee County Jail, 501 SE 8 Street, Topeka, KS 66607 (JSF)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 4:06-cv-03252; Krallman v. State of Kansas et al;
extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: PRISONER PAYMENT ORDER granting 2 Motion for Leave to Proceed in forma pauperis. Plaintiff Matthew D. Krallman is ordered to pay initial filing fee of $6.30 by 12/8/06. Clerk shall serve a copy of this order on appropriate officer at plaintiff's institution. Ordered by Magistrate Judge F. A. Gossett. COPIES MAILED to CJ-SHAWNEE Shawnee County Jail, 501 SE 8 Street, Topeka, KS 66607 (JSF)

titleInfo.title: Krallman v. State of Kansas et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER ON INITIAL REVIEW, ORDER ON MOTION FOR TRO AND ORDER TO SHOW CAUSE - denying plaintiff's Motion for an Emergency Injunction (TRO) 4. By 12/29/2006, the plaintiff shall show cause in writing why this case should not be dismissed, without prejudice. In the absence of a timely and sufficient showing of cause, this case may be subject to dismissal, without prejudice, without further notice.Ordered by Judge Laurie Smith Camp. (JSF)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 4:06-cv-03252; Krallman v. State of Kansas et al;
extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER ON INITIAL REVIEW, ORDER ON MOTION FOR TRO AND ORDER TO SHOW CAUSE - denying plaintiff's Motion for an Emergency Injunction (TRO) 4. By 12/29/2006, the plaintiff shall show cause in writing why this case should not be dismissed, without prejudice. In the absence of a timely and sufficient showing of cause, this case may be subject to dismissal, without prejudice, without further notice.Ordered by Judge Laurie Smith Camp. (JSF)

titleInfo.title: Krallman v. State of Kansas et al
titleInfo.subTitle: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER - That pursuant to 28 U.S.C. 1404(a), this case is transferred to the United States District Court for the District of Kansas. This case shall be closed for statistical purposes by the Clerk of Court for the District of Nebraska. That the Clerk of Court for the District of Nebraska shall deliver the record of this case in a form, whether electronic or otherwise, which is acceptable to the transferee Court. The Clerk of Court for the District of Nebraska shall send a copy of this Memorandum and Order to the plaintiff. That Filing Nos. 8 and 9, the plaintiff's pending motions, are denied without prejudice to reassertion in the transferee court. Ordered by Judge Laurie Smith Camp. (JAE, )
